title: オールカマーの後に・負けて、爆走

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So frustrating—I couldn't win.
Turbo was amazing, huh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I want to win next time.
Yeah, I have to try harder.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha,
she's running off with incredible speed—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh, wait, the station,
isn't it over there!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whew—found you!
I lost sight of you on the way and panicked!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The academy isn't this way.
Wrong way, wrong way!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
There's a bus stop over there,
let's take it back!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Waaah!
I'm so glad Machitan came, I was so scared~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Right, are you thirsty?
I have juice.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Thirsty... I am!
I'll drink juice!
After that, it was Matikanetannhauser who carried the tired, sleeping Twin Turbo home on her back.
